profile.name: Prachanda Oli
profile.summary: Results-driven Software Developer with expertise in backend development, ERP systems, and full-stack application design. Experienced in Python/Django, .NET Framework, and Odoo ERP customization. Proven ability to optimize database queries, design REST APIs, and deliver scalable solutions.

details: Led the BTP Game Development Project, managing a team of developers.
Customized Odoo ERP modules using Python, ORM, and QWeb templating.
Optimized PostgreSQL queries reducing execution time via indexing strategies.
Designed RESTful APIs for communication between Odoo and external systems.
Developed desktop apps using C# and .NET WinForms with MVC architecture.
Optimized SQL Server queries to improve application response time.
Implemented business logic using Entity Framework and ADO.NET.

projects.title: High-Performance E-Commerce Platform
projects.tech: Django, Redis, Celery, Channels, Docker, PostgreSQL
projects.desc: Scalable sales system handling 1000+ concurrent users with row-level locking (concurrency control), real-time WebSocket inventory updates, and content-based product recommendations using TF-IDF.

projects.title: FashionBST - E-Commerce Search
projects.tech: FastAPI, BST (Binary Search Tree), SQLite, Docker, CI/CD
projects.desc: E-Commerce application for product management and fast, real-time prefix search using a custom Binary Search Tree (BST) implementation. Integrated with Docker and GitHub Actions for CI/CD.

projects.title: Interactive Sales Analytics Dashboard
projects.desc: Sales analytics dashboard for Walmart, visualizing trends and projections. Features a FastAPI backend, dynamic charts, REST API endpoints, and a Dockerized CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: Real-Time Messenger App
projects.desc: Full-featured chat app with real-time messaging, typing indicators, and online status using ASGI and WebSockets. Includes friend management and persistent chat history.

projects.title: Tour Recommendation System
projects.desc: Personalized recommendation system using TF-IDF and cosine similarity for user preferences.

projects.title: Public Library Resource Mgmt
projects.desc: Managed books and loans with custom Client Actions and dynamic dashboards.

projects.title: Book Management System
projects.desc: Repository pattern implementation with Entity Identity for secure authentication.
